meanings.definition: A long, thin, flat piece of wood or other hard material used for floors or other building purposes.
meanings.sent1: I placed the board on the floor to fix it.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used the board to build the new deck.
meanings.sent3: The board on the floor seemed to be playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as flat as a board.
meanings.sent5: The board creaked under my weight as I walked on it.

meanings.definition: A group of people who manage or direct a company or organization.
meanings.sent1: The board decided to invest in new technology.
meanings.sent2: The board members meet every month to discuss business strategies.
meanings.sent3: The board of directors had a pizza party to celebrate a successful year.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a pawn on the chessboard of the board's decisions.
meanings.sent5: The board's decision to expand globally was met with mixed reactions.

meanings.definition: A flat, thin, rectangular piece of stiff material used for writing or displaying information.
meanings.sent1: She wrote her name on the board with chalk.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used the board to explain the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The board seemed to have a mind of its own, erasing the notes unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His words were written on the board of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The whiteboard marker squeaked as she wrote on the board.

meanings.definition: To get on or into a ship, aircraft, or other vehicle.
meanings.sent1: We will board the plane in an hour.
meanings.sent2: Passengers must board the ship before departure.
meanings.sent3: The idea to board the spaceship for a vacation was out of this world.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a pirate ready to board the enemy ship.
meanings.sent5: The opportunity to board the luxury yacht was a dream come true.

meanings.definition: A piece of wood or other material used for a specific purpose, such as cutting or serving food.
meanings.sent1: The chef used the board to chop vegetables.
meanings.sent2: She placed the cheese platter on the wooden board.
meanings.sent3: The board for cutting looked like a mini stage for the vegetables.
meanings.sent4: His words hit her heart like a sharp knife on a cutting board.
meanings.sent5: The serving board was beautifully decorated with fruits and cheese.
